mapper.update: update user_coin_wallet set total = #{total,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, frozen = #{frozen,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, borrow = #{borrow,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ico = #{ico,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select wallet.*,coin.name as coinName,coin.short_name as shortName from user_coin_wallet wallet LEFT JOIN system_coin_type coin on wallet.coin_id = coin.id where wallet.uid = #{uid} and coin.status != 2 order by coin.sort_id
